title: Implement completion overlay modal
description:
Implement renderCompleteOverlay() function:

Triggered when run completes (RunCompleteMsg received)
Modal overlay centered on screen

Content:
┌─ Run Complete ───────────────────────┐
│                                      │
│  ✓ Epic completed successfully       │
│                                      │
│  Reason:     All tasks closed        │
│  Signal:     COMPLETE                │
│  Iterations: 12                      │
│  Duration:   5m 23s                  │
│  Cost:       $2.45                   │
│  Tasks:      8/8 completed           │
│                                      │
│  Press q to quit                     │
└──────────────────────────────────────┘

Dynamic content based on completion reason:
- COMPLETE: green checkmark, success message
- EJECT: orange warning, eject reason
- BLOCKED: red X, blocked info
- MAX_ITER: yellow, budget info
- MAX_COST: yellow, cost info

Styling:
- Dark background
- Colored icon based on result
- Labeled values with dim labels, bright values
- Centered using placeOverlay()
